Create the cohort lookups

Source: R/create_episode_file.R
create_cohort_lookups.Rd

Create the cohort lookups

Usage

create_cohort_lookups(data, year, update = latest_update())

Arguments

data

The in-progress episode file data.

year

The year to process, in FY format.

update

The update to use.

Value

The data unchanged (the cohorts are written to disk)

See also

Other episode_file: add_activity_after_death_flag(), add_homelessness_flag(), add_nsu_cohort(), add_ppa_flag(), correct_cij_vars(), create_cost_inc_dna(), fill_missing_cij_markers(), link_delayed_discharge_eps()
